   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(run_erl_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   24: -export([basic/1,heavy/1,heavier/1,defunct/1]).
   25: -export([sleepy_child/1]).
   26: -export([ping_me_back/1]).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: 
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   32:      {timetrap, {minutes, 2}}].
   33: 
   34: all() -> 
   35:     [basic, sleepy_child, heavy, heavier, defunct].
   36: 
   37: 
   38: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   39:     case os:type() of
   40: 	{unix,_} -> basic_1(Config, "basic", "");
   41: 	_ -> {skip,"Not Unix"}
   42:     end.
   43: 
   44: basic_1(Config, Case, Opt) ->
   45:     {Node,Pipe} = do_run_erl(Config, Case, Opt),
   46: 
   47:     ToErl = open_port({spawn,"to_erl "++Pipe}, []),
   48:     erlang:port_command(ToErl, "halt().\r\n"),
   49: 
   50:     receive
   51: 	{nodedown,Node} ->
   52: 	    io:format("Down: ~p\n", [Node])
   53:     after 10000 ->
   54: 	    ct:fail(timeout)
   55:     end,
   56: 
   57:     ok.
   58: 
   59: sleepy_child(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   60:     case os:type() of
   61: 	{unix,_} -> basic_1(Config, "sleepy_child", "-sleepy-child ");
   62: 	_ -> {skip,"Not Unix"}
   63:     end.
   64: 
   65: heavy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   66:     case os:type() of
   67: 	{unix,_} -> heavy_1(Config);
   68: 	_ -> {skip,"Not Unix"}
   69:     end.
   70: 
   71: heavy_1(Config) ->
   72:     {Node,Pipe} = do_run_erl(Config, "heavy"),
   73: 
   74:     ToErl = open_port({spawn,"to_erl "++Pipe}, []),
   75:     IoFormat = "io:format(\"~s\n\", [lists:duplicate(10000, 10)]).\r\n",
   76:     erlang:port_command(ToErl, IoFormat),
   77:     erlang:port_command(ToErl, IoFormat),
   78:     erlang:port_command(ToErl, IoFormat),
   79:     erlang:port_command(ToErl, "init:stop().\r\n"),
   80:     
   81:     receive
   82: 	{nodedown,Node} ->
   83: 	    io:format("Down: ~p\n", [Node])
   84:     after 10000 ->
   85: 	    ct:fail(timeout)
   86:     end,
   87: 
   88:     case count_new_lines(ToErl, 0) of
   89:         Nls when Nls > 30000 ->
   90:             ok;
   91:         Nls ->
   92:             ct:fail("new_lines: ~p\n", [Nls])
   93:     end.
   94:     
   95: 
   96: ping_me_back([Node]) when is_atom(Node) ->
   97:     net_adm:ping(Node);
   98: ping_me_back([Node]) ->
   99:     net_adm:ping(list_to_atom(Node)).
  100:     
  101: count_new_lines(P, N) ->
  102:     receive
  103: 	{P,{data,S}} ->
  104: 	    count_new_lines(P, count_new_lines_1(S, N))
  105:     after 0 ->
  106: 	    N
  107:     end.
  108: 
  109: count_new_lines_1([$\n|T], N) ->
  110:     count_new_lines_1(T, N+1);
  111: count_new_lines_1([_|T], N) ->
  112:     count_new_lines_1(T, N);
  113: count_new_lines_1([], N) -> N.
  114: 	
  115: heavier(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     case os:type() of
  117: 	{unix,_} -> heavier_1(Config);
  118: 	_ -> {skip,"Not Unix"}
  119:     end.
  120: 
  121: heavier_1(Config) ->
  122:     {Node,Pipe} = do_run_erl(Config, "heavier"),
  123: 
  124:     ToErl = open_port({spawn,"to_erl "++Pipe}, []),
  125:     io:format("ToErl = ~p\n", [ToErl]),
  126:     Seed = {1,555,42},
  127:     rand:seed(exsplus, Seed),
  128:     SeedCmd = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("rand:seed(exsplus, ~p). \r\n",
  129: 					  [Seed])),
  130:     io:format("~p\n", [SeedCmd]),
  131:     erlang:port_command(ToErl, SeedCmd),
  132: 
  133:     Iter = 1000,
  134:     MaxLen = 2048,
  135: 
  136:     Random = "f(F), "++
  137: 	"F = fun(F,0) -> ok; "++
  138: 	       "(F,N) -> " ++
  139: 	           "io:format(\"\\\"~s\\\"~n\","++
  140: 	                     "[[35|[rand:uniform(25)+65 || " ++
  141: 	                     "_ <- lists:seq(1, "++
  142: 	                                "rand:uniform("++
  143:                                              integer_to_list(MaxLen)++
  144:                                         "))]]]), "++
  145: 	           "F(F,N-1) "++
  146:              "end,"++ 
  147:         "F(F,"++integer_to_list(Iter)++")."++" \r\n",
  148: 
  149: 
  150:     io:format("~p\n", [Random]),
  151:     erlang:port_command(ToErl, Random),
  152: 
  153:     %% Finish.
  154:     
  155:     erlang:port_command(ToErl, "init:stop().\r\n"),
  156:     receive_all(Iter, ToErl, MaxLen),
  157:     receive
  158: 	{nodedown,Node} ->
  159: 	    io:format("Down: ~p\n", [Node])
  160:     after 10000 ->
  161: 	    c:flush(),
  162: 	    ct:fail(timeout)
  163:     end,
  164: 
  165:     ok.
  166: 
  167: receive_all(Iter, ToErl, MaxLen) ->
  168:     receive_all_1(Iter, [], ToErl, MaxLen).
  169: 
  170: receive_all_1(0, _, _, _) -> ok;
  171: receive_all_1(Iter, Line, ToErl, MaxLen) ->
  172:     NumChars = rand:uniform(MaxLen),
  173:     Pattern = [rand:uniform(25)+65 || _ <- lists:seq(1, NumChars)],
  174:     receive_all_2(Iter, {NumChars,Pattern}, Line, ToErl, MaxLen).
  175:     
  176: 
  177: receive_all_2(Iter, {NumChars,Pattern}, Line0, ToErl, MaxLen) ->
  178:     case receive_match(Line0, {NumChars,Pattern}) of
  179: 	{match,Line} ->
  180: 	    %%io:format("Match: ~p\n", [Line]),
  181: 	    receive_all_1(Iter-1, Line, ToErl, MaxLen);
  182: 	{nomatch,Line} ->
  183: 	    %%io:format("NoMatch: ~p\n", [Line]),
  184: 	    receive
  185: 		{ToErl,{data,S}} ->
  186: 		    %%io:format("Recv: ~p\n", [S]),
  187: 		    receive_all_2(Iter, {NumChars,Pattern}, Line++S, ToErl, MaxLen)		    
  188: 	    after 10000 ->
  189: 		    ct:fail("Timeout waiting for\n~p\ngot\n~p\n", [Pattern, Line])
  190: 	    end
  191:     end.
  192: 
  193: 
  194: receive_match("\"#"++T, {NumChars,Pattern}) when length(T) >= NumChars ->
  195:     Match = lists:sublist(T, NumChars),
  196:     io:format("match candidate: ~p\n", [Match]),
  197:     Match = Pattern,
  198:     {match,lists:nthtail(NumChars, T)};
  199: receive_match("\"#"++T, _) ->
  200:     {nomatch,"\"#"++T};
  201: receive_match("\""=Line, _) ->
  202:     {nomatch,Line};
  203: receive_match([_|T], Tpl) ->
  204:     receive_match(T, Tpl);
  205: receive_match(Line, _) ->
  206:     {nomatch,Line}.
  207: 
  208: 
  209: defunct(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  210:     case os:type() of
  211: 	{unix,_} -> defunct_1(Config);
  212: 	_ -> {skip,"Not Unix"}
  213:     end.
  214: 
  215: defunct_1(Config) ->
  216:     case os:find_executable(perl) of
  217: 	false ->
  218: 	    {skip,"No perl found"};
  219: 	Perl ->
  220: 	    defunct_2(Config, Perl)
  221:     end.
  222: 
  223: defunct_2(Config, Perl) ->
  224:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  225:     RunErlTest = filename:join(Data, "run_erl_test.pl"),
  226:     Defuncter = filename:join(Data, "defuncter.pl"),
  227:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  228:     LogDir = filename:join(Priv, "defunct"),
  229:     ok = file:make_dir(LogDir),
  230:     Pipe = LogDir ++ "/",
  231:     RunErl = os:find_executable(run_erl),
  232:     Cmd = Perl ++ " " ++ RunErlTest ++ " \"" ++ RunErl ++ "\" " ++
  233: 	Defuncter ++ " " ++ Pipe ++ " " ++ LogDir,
  234:     io:format("~p", [Cmd]),
  235:     Res = os:cmd(Cmd),
  236:     io:format("~p\n", [Res]),
  237:     "OK"++_ = Res,
  238:     ok.
  239: 
  240: %%% Utilities.
  241: 
  242: do_run_erl(Config, Case) ->
  243:     do_run_erl(Config, Case, "").
  244: do_run_erl(Config, Case, Opt) ->
  245:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  246:     LogDir = filename:join(Priv, Case),
  247:     ok = file:make_dir(LogDir),
  248:     Pipe = LogDir ++ "/",
  249:     NodeName = "run_erl_node_" ++ Case,
  250:     Cmd = "run_erl "++Opt++Pipe++" "++LogDir++" \"erl -sname " ++ NodeName ++
  251: 	" -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++
  252: 	" -s " ++ ?MODULE_STRING ++ " ping_me_back " ++
  253: 	atom_to_list(node()) ++ "\"",
  254:     io:format("~p\n", [Cmd]),
  255:     
  256:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  257:     open_port({spawn,Cmd}, []),
  258:     [_,Host] = string:lexemes(atom_to_list(node()), "@"),
  259:     Node = list_to_atom(NodeName++"@"++Host),
  260: 
  261:     receive
  262: 	{nodeup,Node} ->
  263: 	    io:format("Up: ~p\n", [Node]);
  264: 	Other ->
  265: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected: ~p\n", [Other])
  266:     after 10000 ->
  267: 	    ct:fail(timeout)
  268:     end,
  269:     {Node,Pipe}.
